mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.state AS "state", a.session_year AS "sessionYear", a.is_finished AS "isFinished", a.url AS "url", a.short_name AS "shortName", a.encoding AS "encoding", a.prefix AS "prefix"
mapper.select: SELECT STATE FROM ATS_TASK ORDER BY STATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ats_task( id, state, session_year, is_finished, url, short_name, encoding ) VALUES ( seq_task.Nextval, #{state}, #{sessionYear}, #{isFinished}, #{url}, #{shortName}, #{encoding} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ats_task SET state = #{state}, session_year = #{sessionYear}, is_finished = #{isFinished}, url = #{url}, short_name = #{shortName}, encoding = #{encoding} WHERE id = #{id}
